title: LFM | Tactical Gaming Recruiting

embed.description: Welcome to Tactical Gaming Register now to join our community of like minded gamers. TG consists of active gamers which have a "real life first" mindset. We aim to satisfy our member's needs for team based gaming by having our Tactical Warfare franchise for warfare based games and our Tactical Sports franchise for sports based games.

body:
A great an amazing community to have fun and climb elos with a bunch of like minded gamers. Ranging through many games but currently looking for more league players for new squads. All welcome to join any elo! Sign on is a little confusing at times but all the same, but its worth it.

Comment here for questions, only add me in game if you are having trouble
Please use " nezzazuri " as a referrer

See you on the battlefield summoners! :)
